photo.title: Extra Curricular Activities - NCC
photo.description: Other than college, students are also involved in extra curricular activities like NCC and get various opportunities. In the snap, Shashank Shovit (2013 batch) gets the opportunity to fly Zen Microlite aircraft. Other students who got the opportunity from the same batch were Komal Choudhary and Vasant Raj Mutha.

photo.title: Bakery
photo.description: Various shops at bakery including refreshment, tea shops, stationary, cyber cafe. Image showing the cyber cafe and refreshment shop.

photo.title: Salad Decoration Competition
photo.description: Another competition - salad decoration competition organised under the Artilary committee of Anukriti'13.

photo.title: Lunch at CCAES'13
photo.description: The participants having lunch at the cloud computing workshop. Cloud Computing and its Applications in Engineering and Sciences (CCAES-2013) was organised under the coordinatorship of Mr. R. K . Bayal.

photo.title: Hostel Day
photo.description: Celebration of hostel day by girls in the girls hostel.

photo.title: Rangoli Competition
photo.description: Image of a rangoli drawn with the help of pulses on the Rangoli competition.

photo.title: Anukriti'11
photo.description: Director and Prof. O. P. Chhangani And Chief Proctor A. K. Dwivedi having seats in the VIP section of Anukriti cultural night.

photo.title: Cloud Computing workshop
photo.description: Participants from all over India concentrating on the Guest Lecture organised under the Cloud Computing and its Applications in Engineering And Sciences (CCAES - 2013).

photo.title: A-Block
photo.description: Painting drawn on the wall of A-block showing the departments in this block.

photo.title: Boys Hostel
photo.description: 1st Year Boys Hostel located seperate from the senior boys hostel.

photo.title: Artilary committee
photo.description: A decoration of the Artilary committee showing the events under the committee at the time of Anukriti'2013.

photo.title: Jawahar Sagar Dam
photo.description: A trip to Jawahar sagar hydel power plant by CS & IT students. The image shows the dam at the backside.

photo.title: Extra curricular activities - NCC
photo.description: Students also take part in various extra curricular activities outside the college. The picture shows the cadets dressed in NCC air wing uniform.

photo.title: Central Library
photo.description: The central library located in the centre of the college area. The upper portion is the book bank and the lower one is the central library which issues reference books.
